description.title: UC GIS
description.description: Create your own initiative by combining existing applications with a custom site. Use this initiative to form teams around a problem and invite your community to participate.
description.snippet: Connecting the people who administer and use GIS to support the academic mission of the University of California college system.

values.title: UC GIS

settings.markdown:
WELCOME TO UC-GIS

Connecting the people who administer and use GIS to support the academic mission of the University of California college system.

Find information on Geographic Information Systems (GIS) across the UC system. Our goal is to bring together people and knowledge about spatial research at UC campuses, mapping practices, and GIS license administration.

GET INFORMATION ON:

GETTING STARTED WITH UC-GIS

Learn more about GIS and what people are doing at the UCs.

Explore

USING SPATIAL TECHNOLOGY

Leverage the expertise and research at other UCs to further your own skills.

Explore

LICENSING

Find out best practices for administrating site licenses for software like ArcGIS Pro, ERDAS, and more.

Explore

GET INVOLVED

The UC GIS team is active on the UC Tech Slack workspace in the #mapping-and-gis channel.
Join UC Tech
STAY UC-GIS CONNECTED
Providing your information below will list you as a specialist that people can reach out to.

• Submit Your Personal or Campus Information


  • Information is Verified and Published to the Site


  • Others Can Find That Information and Connect


  • Collaborate!

People

Learn more about people doing GIS in the UC system!

Resources

See what GIS learning resources, trainings, and tutorials are available UC campuses.

Showcase

Get inspired by research and projects using GIS within the UC system.
